price: Bagkus, tunay na ang Panginoon niya ay laging sa kanya nakakikita.
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
